Steps.Name: Step: User can create global filter with name 'gf_test'
Step: Create a dynamic rule with name `dr_test_1'
Step: Create dynamic rule 'dr_test_2' with include two tags
Step: Create dynamic rule 'dr_test_3' with exclude one tag
Step: Create dynamic rule 'dr_test_4' with exclude two tags.
Step: Create dynamic rule 'dr_test_5' with include/exclude tags
Step: User can create security policy.
